statements: SELECT * FROM tagging_text_data;
SELECT text_data, part_of_speech FROM tagging_text_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM tagging_text_data WHERE part_of_speech = 'noun';
SELECT text_data FROM tagging_text_data WHERE id IN (2, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM tagging_text_data ORDER BY part_of_speech DESC, id ASC;
SELECT id, text_data, part_of_speech FROM tagging_text_data;
SELECT * FROM tagging_text_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT text_data, part_of_speech, id FROM tagging_text_data WHERE part_of_speech = 'Noun';
SELECT * FROM tagging_text_data WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, text_data FROM tagging_text_data WHERE text_data LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, text, part_of_speech FROM text_data;
SELECT text, part_of_speech, id FROM text_data;
SELECT part_of_speech, text, id FROM text_data;
SELECT id, text FROM text_data WHERE part_of_speech = 'Noun';
SELECT id, part_of_speech FROM text_data WHERE text LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, text, part_of_speech FROM text_data WHERE part_of_speech = 'noun';
SELECT * FROM text_data WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY text ASC;
SELECT id, UPPER(text) AS uppercase_text FROM text_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, text, part_of_speech FROM text_data INNER JOIN pos_tags ON text_data.part_of_speech = pos_tags.tag WHERE pos_tags.tag = 'NN';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM text_data WHERE text LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM tags;
SELECT tag_name, id FROM tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT text_data, part_of_speech FROM text_data_tags WHERE part_of_speech = 'Noun';
SELECT tag_id, text_data_id FROM text_tag_relations WHERE tag_id = 2;
SELECT id, tag_name FROM tags WHERE id = 3;
SELECT text_data, part_of_speech FROM text_data_tags;
SELECT * FROM tags WHERE tag_name = 'Noun';
SELECT text_data, tag_name FROM text_data_tags JOIN text_tag_relations ON text_data_tags.id = text_tag_relations.text_data_id JOIN tags ON tags.id = text_tag_relations.tag_id;
SELECT tag_name, COUNT(text_data_id) AS frequency FROM tags JOIN text_tag_relations ON tags.id = text_tag_relations.tag_id GROUP BY tag_name;
SELECT text_data, part_of_speech FROM text_data_tags WHERE part_of_speech IN ('Noun', 'Verb') ORDER BY text_data DESC;
SELECT * FROM tag_data;
SELECT text_data, pos_info FROM tag_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, noun_word FROM nouns ORDER BY noun_word DESC;
SELECT * FROM verbs WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT adjective_word FROM adjectives WHERE id > 3;
SELECT * FROM tag_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, noun_word FROM nouns WHERE id > 10 AND id < 20 ORDER BY noun_word ASC;
SELECT tag_data.id, verbs.verb_word, adjectives.adjective_word FROM tag_data JOIN verbs ON tag_data.id = verbs.id JOIN adjectives ON tag_data.id = adjectives.id WHERE tag_data.id < 100
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_nouns FROM nouns;
SELECT * FROM tag_data WHERE text_data LIKE '%example%' AND pos_info IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM User_Profile;
SELECT username, email FROM User_Profile;
SELECT text_content FROM Text_Data WHERE text_id = 1;
SELECT pos_tag FROM Part_of_Speech WHERE pos_id = 2;
SELECT u.username, t.tag_timestamp FROM User_Profile u JOIN User_Tags ut ON u.user_id = ut.user_id JOIN Tagged_Text_Data t ON ut.tag_id = t.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM User_Profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM User_Profile ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT text_content FROM Text_Data WHERE text_id = 3;
SELECT username, email FROM User_Profile WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM Tagged_Text_Data JOIN Part_of_Speech ON Tagged_Text_Data.pos_id = Part_of_Speech.pos_id WHERE tag_id = 2;
